column6: Once in a lifetime opportunity to purchase a prime block of land close to piliyandala town. Situated in Church Road suwarapola, 300 meters to 255 bus route with multiple access to 120 main bus route. Inherited land with over 100 years of family history. Located adjoining a paddy field with lush green surroundings yet conveniently located to schools, super markets, university, temple , church etc. Very popular area for accommodating university students. Simply a paradise for investor with limitless potential. Can be easily subdivided for multiple blocks or use as a commercial property with ample parking. Ideal place for a reception hall or even a supermarket. 20 feet wide road. Property has two houses currently been rented with decent rental income and well secured with  brick fences all around. Brokers welcome with maximum of 3% commission. Please call Mrs Nanda Rajapaksha for inspections or inquiries.

Once in a lifetime opportunity to purchase a prime block of land close to piliyandala town. Situated in Church Road suwarapola, 300 meters to 255 bus route with multiple access to 120 main bus route. Inherited land with over 100 years of family history. Located adjoining a paddy field with lush green surroundings yet conveniently located to schools, super markets, university, temple , church etc. Very popular area for accommodating university students. Simply a paradise for investor with limitless potential. Can be easily subdivided for multiple blocks or use as a commercial property with ample parking. Ideal place for a reception hall or even a supermarket. 20 feet wide road. Property has two houses currently been rented with decent rental income and well secured with  brick fences all around. Brokers welcome with maximum of 3% commission. Please call Mrs Nanda Rajapaksha for inspections or inquiries.
